data.persona: I am a blacksmith.  The king brings his horses to me to fit their shoes.  I also do wonderous things with metal.
data.description:
You are in the Firewood Forest.
The forest has many trees. The majority of the trees are green however a few are orange and red. The forest is huge and seems to never end.
There's an animal, a tree, and a wood is gathered to make fire here.
The witch is here.

You are carrying a hammer and a Chisel.

data.short_motivation: I want to eat the herb for strength
data.mid_motivation: I plan to protect the witch throughout the night
data.long_motivation: I intend to safely escort the witch back to her kingdom before the end of winter
